newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - July 8.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - July 8.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Libya urges Security Council to review sanctions.
- Saudi Basic Industries Corp moves to merge production operations.
- Syria and Iran express their concern over Israeli-Turkish cooperation.
- Saudi King Fahd says development needs are behind the expansion of Shura council to 90 members from 60.
